content: Revenue of approximately $73 million for the quarter, was -- is 61% increase over last year, and compared to pre -pandemic levels we achieved 17% growth over the first quarter of 2019 absolutely a tremendous accomplishment for our commercial services team. Driven primarily by the New York City photo enforcement expansion efforts, revenue increased by $35 million to $79 million for the first quarter. Service revenue for the first quarter was $73 million, which grew $29 million or 66% year-over-year. As David mentioned, this represents the acquisition of T2 Systems, which closed in December 2021, revenue of $18 million and adjusted EBITDA of slightly over $3 million was directly aligned with our expectations for the quarter.
